formattedAddress: 246 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 246 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: After showing us and then missing out on a few apartments , David B was truly lovely in contacting us about our current apartment before it was listed. He knew that our prior lease was about to end , and he let us know that it was the same line that we had already seen but on a different floor and if we wanted it, it was ours. Because of a misunderstanding and listing price issue, David didn't take a broker's fee for his hard work but also landed us a price that we could afford. He helped us secure a stunning apartment that had been redone, is spacious, bright, close to family. We are so happy here thanks to David.

originalText.text: Moving from Atlanta to NYC was difficult, especially during a pandemic, but thanks to Caroline and her team, we had a smooth transition. We worked with several brokers before we found the Stone Crest team and only then did my anxiety ease up. They found a beautiful apartment that checked all of our boxes that was off market that we never would’ve seen without them. Once we found *the one*, Caroline worked around the clock to make sure we didn’t lose it. 6 months later, we’re sitting in our beautiful apartment, watching the snow fall over Central Park and we couldn’t be happier — Thank you Stone Crest Realty! Highly recommend this team!!

originalText.text: Highly recommend David B! I was having a lot of trouble finding an apartment in NYC due in large part to apathetic realtors, but I got really lucky finding David as he was super attentive and I ended up signing a lease with him as my realtor. A marked difference from the dozen other realtors I've dealt with on this apartment hunt.

originalText.text: David was absolutely fantastic to work with. He was extremely professional while still making me feel comfortable throughout the entire process; always communicating what was going on, answering practically immediately to text messages and phone calls, and always making sure I was getting the most accurate information as to what was going on. I could not have asked for a better broker, and I will go back to her for help in the search of future apartments.

originalText.text:
Renting in NYC can be extremely stressful, but the professionals at Stonecrest are proof that it does not have to be.

From first contact to lease signing, David and Forrest were extraordinarily diligent in helping me secure an apartment. All my questions and concerns were answered promptly. I've dealt with many NYC brokers, and this is the first time I did not experience a single letdown or surprise.

David and Forrest truly went above and beyond. If you'd like your real estate needs managed by thoughtful, honest, professionals, work with Stonecrest. I will be recommending Stonecrest to all my friends and family.
